text: Hey @ThisIsOurShot! We stand with you! The @MaineAAP knows that the #covidvaccine is safe and effective. The best #COVID19 vaccine is the one closest to your arm! #tbt to all the Maine pediatricians supporting COVID-19 vaccination. #CrushCOVID #ThisIsOurShot #vaccinated #vaccine https://t.co/JSy7LB5sNe
